original_title: The Funeral Procession of Buenaventura Durruti
overview: 10 min of footage from the Spanish revolutionary struggle saved in the CGT union archives  - funeral procession for Durruti in Barcelona (over 500000 strong)  - diverse street & battle scenes  - condor legion air attacks.  Voice over: Emma Goldman
title: The Funeral Procession of Buenaventura Durruti
